Just kidding.  The following 8 cards are offered below in living color.

Hemphill                                            Sovereign 150                    28.00
Chappelle (Double Name)                   Sweet Cap 350                    SOLD
Evers with Bat Yellow                         Apple Sovereign 350            48.00
Frank Owen                                       Sweet Cap 150 Fact 649      SOLD
Nicholls Fielding                                 Piedmont 150                      20.00
Bescher Portrait                                 Sovereign 350                    SOLD
G. Browne CHI                                 Piedmont 150                     24.00
Hummel                                            Sovereign 460                    SOLD

All prices include shipping.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/junk/13735/colf[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/junk/13736/colr[/IMG]

Frank,

If you'll ship to England (will happily pay for postage)  I'll take the Owen.

Thanks
Martin

I'll take the Frank Owen Sweet Cap 150 Fact 649.
PM sent. 
Thanks, 
Christopher.
